statements: SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating = 5
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE course_id = 456 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE instructor_id = 789 AND user_id = 123
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY course_id HAVING feedback_count > 3
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE course_id = 5 ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, instructor_id, feedback_text FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND rating < 4
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) AS num_courses, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY instructor_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) > 2 ORDER BY num_courses DESC, avg_rating DESC
SELECT course_name, course_rating FROM courses;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_rating > 4.5;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses INNER JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id;
SELECT course_name, course_rating, feedback FROM courses ORDER BY course_rating DESC;

SELECT course_name, course_rating, instructor_name FROM courses INNER JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id WHERE instructor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_name, course_rating FROM courses WHERE course_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT instructor_name, total_ratings FROM instructors WHERE total_ratings > 100 ORDER BY total_ratings DESC;

SELECT course_name, instructor_name, course_rating, average_rating FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id WHERE average_rating > 4.0 ORDER BY course_rating DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, total_ratings, average_rating FROM instructors WHERE average_rating < 3.5 ORDER BY total_ratings DESC, average_rating ASC;

SELECT course_name, instructor_name, total_ratings FROM courses JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id WHERE total_ratings > 50 ORDER BY course_name ASC, total_ratings DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_rating FROM courses ORDER BY course_rating DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE instructor_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE instructor_rating > 4.5;
SELECT course_name, course_feedback FROM courses WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_name, course_rating, course_feedback FROM courses WHERE course_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_rating FROM instructors ORDER BY instructor_rating DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name, rating, comment FROM courses JOIN feedback ON courses.course_id = feedback.course_id;
SELECT course_name, course_rating FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT user_id, course_id, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM Course WHERE id = 2;
SELECT instructor_id, email FROM Instructor WHERE name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM Rating WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) FROM UserFeedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT UserFeedback.*, Course.name FROM UserFeedback JOIN Course ON UserFeedback.course_id = Course.id;
SELECT Instructor.name, COUNT(*) FROM UserFeedback JOIN Instructor ON UserFeedback.instructor_id = Instructor.id GROUP BY Instructor.name;
SELECT Course.name, COUNT(*) FROM UserFeedback JOIN Course ON UserFeedback.course_id = Course.id GROUP BY Course.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, course_rating FROM Courses WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_rating, feedback FROM Courses WHERE course_rating > 4.5;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT instructor_name, department, experience_years FROM Instructors WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT course_name, course_rating, instructor_id FROM Courses WHERE course_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE user_id = 101 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, department, experience_years FROM Instructors ORDER BY experience_years DESC, instructor_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, email, registration_date FROM Users WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, rating FROM Courses c LEFT JOIN Instructors i ON c.instructor_id = i.instructor_id ORDER BY rating DESC, course_name ASC;
